thread.title: Just what you would expect great
thread.title_full: Just what you would expect great - Review of Premier Inn London St Pancras Hotel, London, England - TripAdvisor

author: Sheana M
title: Just what you would expect great
text: We stayed with 10 year old twins. Usual good service. We got off the Caledonian Sleeper and it was a 10 minute walk. Even better our room was ready at 8am brilliant.room was good and clean. We misplaced a teddy . I emailed them and they are posting it up. Really really helpful
